Text: This is working for everybody?
I'm downloading, a little bit nervous about the spell book because I had a bug with it when I install it as simspack. Hope this one work.
my spellbook works fine but does this have the library in it . i cant find it in my game.
No, it does not have the library lot. I'll see what I can do about uploading it.

Thank you very much, fast downloading and the spell book works perfectly. I think the building needs to be separated from package. It's like the previous Olympian Gym, I have to install the gym and library from sims3pack.
But is there a massage chair in the package? I can't find it nowhere.
Again, thanks for sharing.
Oops, sorry. I made a mistake, the massage chair is in June compilation, not July. I just can't find it.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6485664/The_Sims_3_Store_updates_June_2011_[FULL]___Games4theworld__

Games4theworld has a June store content compilation, if you need to grab it.
I appreciate the link, I can locate the chair now. Thanks for your help.
OMGOMGOMGOMG thank yoooooooooouuuuuuuuu!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Ok I don't have a mods folder in my Sims 3 file. Do I make one or what? I am a derp noob at this so please help. lol
You can simply create a Mods folder. Then you must create the Packages folder within the Mods folder. Then put the files there.
Thanks. Now my sims crashes and the main loading screen is fucked. So I just removed it, thanks though.
If it crashes your game then you did something wrong. Most likely you don't have a Resource.cfg.
So this is July only, correct?
The spell book works, thanks
Yes.
